metadata.description: Antarctic Press and Fred Perry present his sketchiest product yet: a collection of vibrant vignettes and pleasing pin-ups... all originally drawn on sketch cards! Thirty-two solid pages of card images laid out Watchmen-style, presenting Gold Digger characters in ways seen nowhere else, plus all-new short stories! See superhero Crush join Agency Zero and mess with the amazonian Agent Xane's head! See Crush's old partner Avenger in an all-new adventure! See how big Kevin "Ace" Koss's afro was when he was a kid! A true Fred Perry original!
metadata.name: Gold Digger: Sketchcard Album
